website_summaries.verdict: This JanSport backpack is a practical and reliable choice that is also stylish and functional.
pros: This backpack will stand up under heavy wear and could last your child several years
Mesh pocket for carrying water bottles
cons: The cloth over the zippers on this backpack has a tendency to get caught in the zipper

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for in a backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large back pack and holds all my books with more than enough room. In fact, I had a allergy attack one day and even stuck a cube of tissues in with the books and it was no problem. There is also storage in the front that allows you to keep your phone, and pencils in little compartments. I am including a picture so you can see the compartment and get a realistic idea of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Decaire

customer_reviews.title: The print is even better in person!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for myself for an upcoming trip. I can't wait to carry this bag. It is the perfect size if you are needing something a little bit bigger than the standard size backpack. I will get a lot of use out of this for years to come. ***UPDATE: This was perfect as my carry on, and even since my trip I have been using this over and over. I was a little nervous b4 buying it as a 36yr old woman, but the different things I've used it for have already more than justified the purchase. I love this backpack, and the print is sooo pretty!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Spacious Backpack w/Durable Shoulder Straps
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very large, spacious and durable. It's nice, but it's certainly not worth the $40 I paid for it. It has an attractive blue tie dye print (minus the big Jansport label I'd rather do without) and multiple compartments to store plenty of books, clothes, tablet, laptop, pens and many other things. The padded shoulder straps are really thick and curved for maximum comfort and support. I'm a little surprised by the inner white material; it's a bit thinner and cheaper than I expected. But overall this is a good quality backpack. I got it to bring extra shoes and clothes to T.V. shoots in the city, and it's definitely up to the job!
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter who needed more room in her bag. I was skeptical paying the price to only find out it was the same size as the one she currently had. I WAS wrong! It was bigger and she can now fit everything with room to spare! Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Anita F. Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Pockets galore and overall amazingness
customer_reviews.text: We are huge JanSport fans. The graphics on this bag are perfect for a middle-schooler. It’s huge and well-designed. My kiddo adores it. I especially love that the water bottle pocket will securely hold a large water bottle. It’s very hot where we live and can’t get by with a tiny one. It also has tons of pockets, which is great for my trinket-hoarding kid.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for the second year in a row. He really likes it and it fits all his books, folders and school supplies. He's in 8th grade and has to carry a lot of books because they don't get lockers. This backpack fits everything!!
customer_reviews.author: Hot Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price;
customer_reviews.text: We have noticed that this JanSport backpack is more durable than the other brands of a similar match which we have purchased locally. The backpack is exceptionally well made and the design and lasts the time if used without overloading and abuse. This was our choice due to the various pocket options available. My previous JanSport backpack was passed down to friend for continued use.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I like this particular backpack and I had a few of these before. It has a compartment for documents in the front with many separators inside. On top a smaller compartment for pens and all sorts of things you need to have quickly access to. There are 2 main compartments, the first compartment fits a 15" laptop and the rear compartment is the bigger one for clothes or what ever you need to transport. Great backpack for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for returning college students!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag for any student. I'm a returning college student, and is the perfect size bag for my two classes! I'm in love with the color, and the side pocket is great for either a water bottle or a travel coffee mug...the ones without a handle of course!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a bigger backpack cause her new school doesn’t have lockers. The backpack is the perfect size and can fit multiple textbooks, a binder, her lunch etc... It’s super heavy once she gets everything in there, but so far it’s held up amazingly well! I’m impressed! I would definitely recommend. P.S. the print on the backpack is super cute
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect next step up, kiddo has been using a basic Jansport since kindergarten and in 5th grade he needed more room to carry multiple binders and accordion file folders as well as his packed lunch this holds everything with room to spare. He also loves we were able to get the same color as his previous
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Strong, good capacity, works for elementary age
customer_reviews.text: My third grader loves this backpack. It’s slightly heavier, bulkier and bigger than the SuperBreak model which we almost considered, but this one includes two main zipper compartments and water bottle pocket, which is a must. The Super Break model has no water bottle pocket— a total bummer, because that bag would have been sooo lightweight and easier to carry in my opinion. When this bag is loaded with a school binder, lunchbox, sweatshirt and water bottle, it gets a bit uncomfortably heavy for my third grader. Wish Jansport made an in between option that offered the best of both models, but this one is working for us so far.
customer_reviews.author: Heights Mum

customer_reviews.title: Classic JanSport
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Classic style, same as always. Plenty of pockets, also great as a airline personal item. My only complaint is that I wish the straps would have more contour around the shoulders, but they’ve always been this way, very basic but in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Jay0

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of JanSport Big Student backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is for my soon-to-be college son, and he loves it. He chose this as the backpack to bring to his college. This is his fourth JanSport backpack over the years. He has two smaller ones, but he likes the big student backpack the most. He used big student backpack during his high school career too. It's light, nice looking, functional, and heavy duty. It also well serves the functions as a weekend trip bag. Can't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered is not what is pictured on Amazon’s sight - really bummed because this was a back to school gift for my granddaughter and can’t get another one ordered and delivered before school starts!! As you can see by my pictures, the one we received has a black back and black zippers and doesn’t have water bottle pouch or extra compartments.....
customer_reviews.author: Jeano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for 8th grade student. Large enough for all my daughter’s books, supplies, and lunch bag. After 5months of heavy use there is no sign of wear. In previous years I had to replace backpacks mid year due to broken zippers and other wear and tear. This backpack has held up perfectly thus far. Easy to clean. Has wide straps to help support weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie W

customer_reviews.title: Good size backpack that will hold quite a bit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just had to have this backpack for her 8th grade year even if her last Jansport is still in great condition because Jansport just makes a great product! The one small disappointment my daughter (who happens to be very particular about her stuff) pointed out was that the interior of the bag is white. She mentioned that due to all of her school books, etc that she will be transferring back and forth the white may get quite dirty quickly. Other than that, she is a happy camper with her Jansport backpack.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: This bag is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I was heading on vacation and didn't want to drag along a suitcase. I was able to fit a weeks worth of clothes, toiletries, shoes, electronics, etc... into this one bag. Made traveling a breeze! The design is perfect with just the right amount of pockets to keep things organized. The zippers are sturdy and the zipper pulls can easily be hidden by the flap that covers them. I tucked the extended one inside the pocket and secured it with the smaller one, which was then hidden by the cover. Highly recommended for those needing a large, efficient, sturdy backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Root

customer_reviews.title: Not an Original Jansport!
customer_reviews.text: This is not an original jansport. The sewing on backpack was faulty and the inside seams were irregular. I am really upset that they are selling fake jansports and just want to warn you to really check your backpack for irregularities. I just reordered same backpack through Jansport’s website for the same price! Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: A lot of room
customer_reviews.text: Took this recently with me for an 11 day South America trip. I was able to fit everything in it without any problems . I used zip lock traveling bags and put all my clothes in the bags and packed this along with other items in the backpack. There is so much room.
customer_reviews.author: Alexah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've only had two backpacks my entire life and they were both made my JanSport. I'd still be using the first one now if I hadn't wanted a change of color. They last forever and can be used for pretty much everything. They're pretty water resistant, I should know because I've had mine held under a rain gutter and everything inside was pretty much okay. Not too many pockets for people to think you're a huge dork and just enough pockets to keep organized. I've brought it on planes and on trips across the country. They're great for being used as baby bags and sleepovers, plus they can take a ton of abuse. Overall a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A Castner

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this backpack. Looks great, holds up well, comfortable, holds plenty of stuff without extra weight of the actual backpack and there are just enough pockets to keep things organized but not too many that things get lost all over.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a middle school student and loved the deep purple color (her favorite). I was worried about it being too heavy when filled but the straps seemed to be constructed well for any weight. I loved all the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Durable and plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: JanSport Big Student backpacks are my daughter's favorite for school. They hold up very well to all the weight of the school supplies and are very roomy. Although a bit pricey, I would rather pay for something that lasts. Very durable and many beautiful styles to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Jansport Big Student Backpack which we have purchased in the past year (all for different members of our family). They have plenty of space for anything you might need, with two main pockets, as well as a smaller front pocket to organize all of the little things. The adjustable straps are well padded and comfortable for extended wearing. All of the backpacks have held up well, and we most likely will purchase this same bag again when our younger children are bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy @ Living Peacefully with Children

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a 9 year old boy who ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 9 year old boy who insists on carrying toys (LEGOS) with him to school. It is very roomy and fits his homework binder and all the extra weight he insists on carrying. He noticed the extra padded straps right away and smiled saying it no longer hurts to carry his backpack! I first purchased this January 12, 2014. It is now August 8, 2017 and one of the zippers finally broke. It has been the best back pack. It has gone through school, overnight trips, vacations , camping, fishing, kayaking. Yes, I'm going to buy another one. I also purchased 2 other bags in the past 2 years for husband brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Lease

customer_reviews.title: Fluorescent pink is a pretty pink color.
customer_reviews.text: Fluorescent pink color is as you would expect fluorescent pink to look. The picture kind of looks coral to me, but the backpack color is a nice pink. Pink Tulip is a reddish pink, not the magenta I thought if was from the picture. This was a little shocking at first, but I grew to like it after some time. These are great backpacks for 6th grade through college age. Lots of pockets help my kids stay organized in school. Well worth the money for a lasting, comfortable backpack. We have 4 of these packs and they are a hit with all my kids - middle school through high school, boys and girls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for my middle schooler
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for my middle schooler. She has more than enough rooms for her books, binders, chromebook, and lunch bag. This is a heavy duty backpack that should last us all year, and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Fennessy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, size, and color.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this backpack is incredibly roomy. I am using it to hold all of our "in case of a zombie apocalypse" emergency supplies. I thought I would need two backpacks to hold everything, but, no, it all fits easily into one bag. There are two huge main zippered compartments and several smaller ones (and even more compartments inside those compartments!). The straps are very sturdy and comfortable, even when holding a full pack. The backpack, overall, is of very high quality, but I love having the lifetime guarantee anyway. I also love the bright red color. In short, I am extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Holds a LOT and attractive to boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my middle schoolers backpack, which had a broken strap. Her giant (broken backpack) is WAY overweight and when this came in, I didn't think what she had would fit. Wrong! This bag is deceptively roomy and we packed it with ease. It easily handled 4 1/ 1/2" 3 ring binders, 3 workbooks, calculator, pencil bag, snacks, and three large novels checked out from the media center. The zippers don't snag along the way and the pulls are easy to grab . The entire bag has the look and feel of being well made. Plus, it is attractive without being too "girly"- which is not my teen's style. Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Roomy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It has tons of room. There are two large zippered pockets in back and three zippered compartments in front. In the front there are extra pockets and spaces and a small carabiner inside. The mesh water bottle pockets will work for small bottles only. After three years it still looks new. Zippers are in perfect working condition. I machine wash it and hang it dry.
customer_reviews.author: New York Wife, Mom, and Student

customer_reviews.title: Best. Backpack. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son when the first backpack I bought for his sophomore year of high school tore up only three months into the school year. That bag couldn't even hold all his books, and it fell apart even though it looked more sturdy and padded than this one. He has now been using this JanSport backpack for almost a year, and it looks like new. It holds all of his (very large) text books and binders with room to spare and has held up great. The straps were a little stiff at first, but they've broken in nicely. This bag looks like it will last him until graduation next year.
customer_reviews.author: KDA

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a diaper bag. It is a great size and fits everything I need to carry. It has two large compartments so that I can keep diaper changing items and snacks separate. The straps are comfortable. It is difficult to unzip and zip back up with one hand and I typically need to do it one handed because I am holding my son with the other.
customer_reviews.author: Ck1

customer_reviews.title: Love Jansport Backpacks!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is one of the best on the market. I've purchased them since mid 80's. Excellent quality, extremely durable and this color is awesome. In the past, because of the heavy school books, these backpacks usually last two years before showing wear and tear on the corners. Hoping this one holds up as well.
customer_reviews.author: TeeWill

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it
customer_reviews.text: We have bought many JanSport backpacks in the past , but my son Loves this style most of all for this upcoming school year. I am hoping it is as durable as the others since boys can rough handle their things all the time. If I find anything to dislike in the upcoming months, I'll make sure to come back and do another review, but so far it all looks good
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Q

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bag approximately four months and so far it is holding up very well! My son loads that puppy down too!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Kinne

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments/pockets
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is a perfect size for my middle-schooler. I love that there are so many compartments to keep her stuff organized. She's already loaded it up with her binder for school and there is still plenty of room for her yet-to-be-issued laptop. Her last JanSport backpack lasted 4 school years, 1 cross-country move, and several road trips, so I have high expectations for this one.
customer_reviews.author: "haileyq"

customer_reviews.title: Xcellent --  always jansport
customer_reviews.text: Big student backpack wider on top than superbreak. We love both... And like many Jansports they hold up to the wear. Other reviews (and I agree) state that the zipper does get stuck on the backpack itself... which is difficult to fix but is fixable. no other backpack for the price holds up to my teens high school honors books and binders which can be quick heavy. Also not that the shoulder straps are more padded, durable than the superbreak jansport. Both do there job. The photo isn't as pretty as in person.... Daughter was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHCAT MOM

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack for Junior High or High School
customer_reviews.text: Accommodates everything that my Middle Schooler has to carry. Stands up to constant abuse. This is her second one in two years, we only had to replace the first one because our dog chewed through the side pocket to get to some snacks.
customer_reviews.author: NTyler

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sized backpack
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had one of these backpacks since middle school so I had forgotten just how big it is! I have a 15.6" laptop that fits perfectly in the main pocket. This thing fits SO much stuff. I also love that there's a mesh side pocket to put a water bottle (a must for me). The straps are very padded but a little still when you first purchase but they bend into shape after a few uses so it's no big deal. Perfect for hiking, travel, school, whatever you want!
customer_reviews.author: geejae12

customer_reviews.title: Great, Kept up with me for 2 YEARS!!.. impressed
customer_reviews.text: I used this book bag for two years ( My sophomore and junior year in high school), and i love it. it is very durable, it held lots of textbooks and binders, the only problem i had was with the zippers, they got stuck on the fabric a couple times, and the last time it got stuck, the zipper didn't work properly, because i got impatient and tried to pull the zipper away from the fabric lol, so i will buy another one :)
customer_reviews.author: Renay

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack because it has so many compartments, it fits a large amount of items, and the design is cool. Most of all, IT HAS A WATER BOTTLE COMPARTMENT. Not many jansport backpacks have this feature, which is an important one to me. It has comfy straps, which is important if you have lots of items. It was worth the price I paid here, which was not too expensive compared to the original price. I also love that this (and most backpacks by jansport) are pretty durable and last long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingSavvyScientist

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter uses this backpack for school and she loves it. It is quite big and feels sturdy. Overall she is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur-de-lis

customer_reviews.title: Best pack ever
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived so quickly, so I was extremely happy about that. This is my daughter's favorite brand of backpack so we had dto get it again. She loves how much room there is in this particular pack. She can fit quite a few books in it, which is necessary for all the homework she has. I would definitelyy recommend this to anyone looking for a durable backpack capable of carrying all your classroom needs. It has multiple pockets as well to fit your writing utensils. I would definitely purchase this brand the next time I am in need of buying a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: P. LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THE S-STRAPS
customer_reviews.text: THIS BACKPACK APPEARS WELL MADE AND HAS A HUGE CAPACITY. I'VE READ OTHER REVIEWERS WRITING THEY LIKE THE S-STRAPS, BUT, I DO NOT. WHENEVER I HAVE ANY WEIGHT IN THE PACK THE OUTER EDGES OF THE S-STRAPS DIG VERY UNCOMFORTABLY INTO THE FRONT OF MY SHOULDER. NO AMOUNT OF ADJUSTING THE LENGTH OR SHIFTING THE LOAD HELPS. I AM NEARING 70 AND HAVE BEEN USING BACKPACKS FOR DECADES, NEVER HAD THIS PROBLEM BEFORE. I AM A STOCKY GUY WITH WIDE SHOULDERS WHICH PERHAPS ADDS TO THE PROBLEM. TRY THIS PACK ON WITH SOME WEIGHT IN IT BEFORE YOU DECIDE IT'S A "KEEPER".
customer_reviews.author: patchee woznid

customer_reviews.title: Extra room
customer_reviews.text: This bag has extra room for more books. I tell the kids to manage their papers and books, but they don't really listen. Their locker is also in bad position for them to navigate from locker to classrooms. This bag has multiple, probably half of them useless, pockets. Strap is cushioned. Stitching is standard, no reinforcement. I just wish the bag bottoms were reinforced. These bags last about a year, but they all start getting holes. Second purchase after about a year and a half: The bag bottom is ok. The zipper gave out. Still, my rating stands.
customer_reviews.author: ventingisok

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great. It has lots of room. It has two large compartments and a bunch if smaller compartments. In my 4th semester of nursing school, I carried 3 large binders in one compartment and another binder and book in the other compartment, and everything fit just fine. There was still room for 1 more book if I needed it. I love this backpack. Highly recommend it for anyone needing a backpack with tons of room. I also like that it comes in so many different colors.
customer_reviews.author: PatienceRN

customer_reviews.title: This backpack makes me happy
customer_reviews.text: After many years, I decided to go back to school. I needed a new backpack and while browsing Amazon I came across this bag. After reading reviews I purchased it. I'm so glad I did because I love this backpack so much. Top notch quality, but I would not expect anything less from JanSport. The bag is very comfortable and functional with all the different compartments. I'm ready to take this upcoming semester by storm with my JanSport Big Student backpack in tow.
customer_reviews.author: NaSa

customer_reviews.title: Something to think about...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it more stars, but the little strap on the top broke after only a few days. My 10 year old daughter uses this for school and does not carry a lot of weight in it, so this is disappointing to me/us. I have been a Jansport fan for decades but this makes me think that things have changed for the worse at the company. Not sure I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I had a jansport growing up that I still have now 20 years later, so when my first grader's cheap backpack fell apart I figured I'm not buying a 6th cheap backpack it's time to just go for a jansport! Love the design. I'll update if the quality doesn't end up being what it use to be, but so far so good! Lots of pockets, too. It's not quite the same material mine was (this feels more plastic like vs a jean kind of material), but hopefully it will last like my old one has!
customer_reviews.author: NicoleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bought in October and the strap tore off the bag in January!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this if your student is in high school - we bought this for the beginning of the school year and the left strap tore off one week ago and the return window is closed so ... we are out of luck even though we thought we were safe with Jansport. DO NOT PURCHASE if you need a sturdy backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Franco

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable and a great carry on item
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use a backpack as my carry on for my flight to Paris. I wanted something cute and found this. The color is vibrant but not garish. It has lots of pockets so I was able to separate my stuff and find it easily. Straps were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for heavy books!
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks into the school year we are VERY happy with this backpack. My son just started middle school and he has 3 thick textbooks, 4 binders and notebooks galore. He said it's very comfortable carrying everything in this backpack. There are plenty of extra compartments for his house keys, cell phone, snack, water bottle, pens and pencils. I will update at the end of the school year to see how well it holds up. From previous reviews i would expect it to!
customer_reviews.author: Azure - Mom of 2 in MN

customer_reviews.title: zipper broke after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: main zipper malfunctioned after 1.5 school years of use! Note this back pack was used for school with summers off! The quality is no longer there. Ihad a Jansport I used for college and camping for 6 years!!!
customer_reviews.author: JGME

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fits a lot of items.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this bag for 2 months now and it is PACKED with heavy books and her lunch and an umbrella each day. It fits a lot and has not ripped. She likes it.
customer_reviews.author: JPNYC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful backpack. I have bought two for use as my children’s school backpacks. They are well made and roomy with multiple storage areas and pockets. The colors are bright. Will definitely buy my third child one when she is oldest enough to choose a color.
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the item but the seller is strange I ordered 2 bacpacs paid for 2 and i got only 1 i was bac and fors with the seller waited 2 month at the and got my money even i wanted an item very strange seller.
customer_reviews.author: rina

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later
customer_reviews.text: I left a review for another one of thses with a different design. I have twins and both went through 8th grade with these. They still look great with no tears in the material and all the zippers still work great. Only reason I got them new ones was they just HAD to have new ones to start high school. We juat got them new designs of the same make and model.
customer_reviews.author: Mentl

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets, lots of room
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has so much room! My 12 daughter shouldn't have a problem staying organized. We also bought the same style but different color for our 9 year old. A little big on her but it's fine. Color and pattern is true to picture but my only complaint is the material seems thin. I'll have to keep an eye on wear. Thankful for the Jansport guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Lee Claes

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great material, sturdy and the color has never faded the 6 years I've had it. I used it religiously for 2 years in college and loaded it with plenty of heavy supplies!! Durable and an eye catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouslee

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack.
customer_reviews.text: JanSport backpack is exactly what my son wanted. Nice bright red color and a good size for my fifth grader. It has two larger zippered pockets and a couple smaller zippered areas for snacks, supplies, etc. it also has a mesh side pocket to carry a water bottle. I can't say how it will hold up as he's only used it for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Spookykitty

customer_reviews.title: Great buy lots of storage and pockets
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 star if the base inside is thicker but i guess this kind of model doesn't but overall im very satisfied since is has lots of pockets and stuff u can put here has a good divider too
customer_reviews.author: Pros and/or ConsTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Just “ok” quality- not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is ok. After 4 months, the outer pocket is starting to look worn and may have small holes soon. I was hoping to get a few years out of this backpack but I may have to patch it up myself to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Travis H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used a back pack since I was a teenager but the medical program I’m in now requires a heavy load of books and materials. I love, love, love this backpack. It’s made extremely well. Plenty of compartments to keep me organizing with such a large classload. And I am obsessed with the beautiful shade of hot pink!! One of my favorite amazon purchases to date!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C.

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this bag for a charity drive that my company does with Children in Shelters for back to school. Can I just tell you that the bag holds A LOT! I DO MEAN A LOT! Besides being super-sturdy, it held 4 outfits, three pairs of shoes, a whole mess of school supplies. With expandable compartments, this bag can also be a weekender bag because it can hold so much. So glad I brought it. So when next year comes around... this will be the bag I'll be purchasing again. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Crazyanimegyrl

customer_reviews.title: Great Book bag for Middle School
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who started 6th grade. Is perfect size for her to carry and can fit all her books and lunch bag. I wanted a book bag that had a side pouch for her to take a water bottle, which this does, and am overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CRANKA

customer_reviews.title: Holds a 4” Binder
customer_reviews.text: As usual, this brand holds up through time and weather. It holds a massive 4” binder and doesn’t get a hole from the hard corners of this monster binder. We quit trying other brands a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is huge, and fits everything. I use it as a file storage, fits so many folders and books of mine. Used to store my hairblower too! The material I was worried wouldn't hold because it's like a fabric that feels like plastic, but turns out it's super sturdy after all! Great buy, Ive gotten ton of compliments on the design and even asking me where I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: C.Moon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack for traveling!!!
customer_reviews.text: Jansport backpacks last nearly forever!! I use mine for traveling. Never any zippers problems!! Highly recommend jansport!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol S

customer_reviews.title: I'm a full-time college student, and this thing honestly ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a full-time college student, and this thing honestly fits all of my textbooks, notebooks, and binders in it. I can also carry my laptop, and my kindle. It's shown no sign of wear and tear, and the color is as vibrant as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great ... except for
customer_reviews.text: The backpack worked great until now. The zipper for the largest compartment has malfunctioned and does not close properly. Often does not close at all. Supposed to be lifetime warranty. Will contact seller to see what could be done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made and plenty of room for books. The curved straps are really nice for an adult but not comfortable for a middle school student.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: it was just dirty. No issues with zippers or anything
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Had it for 8th grade. Just bought a new one for 9th grade. Nothing wrong with the old one; it was just dirty. No issues with zippers or anything. Holds all books and laptop easily. She walks 1/2 miles home from school bus stop so she needed something sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Always on the go Anthony
customer_reviews.text: Awesome color enjoyed the bag same price though as Jansport.com so not much of a deal had to go through drama galore before getting my bag if you see the same bag at jansport.com just buy from them its easier and you get what you want
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. My daughter is a freshman in HS and this is perfect for all that she has to carry! Durable too! Still looks brand new after 3 months of daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cassise

customer_reviews.title: Not a kiddie book bag anymore!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest went to 4th grade feeling like big kid. Just the right red & durable too. We added a carabiner to the top strap loop so that he could clip his lunch box & save the frustration of forgetting it.
customer_reviews.author: mjsm

customer_reviews.title: Solid backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this backpack for school. It carries a lot of heavy books everyday and has held up well so far. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand it. People say this back lack is flimsy....I love it. Its durable and holds a lot of my stuff in it. I use it as my exercise bag. So happy I bought it and I wish it was around when I was going to school.
customer_reviews.author: Dinata

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for 1 month, but so far it is an excellent pack. I chose the "Mammoth Blue News Stand" design, and I am very pleased with it. Aesthetics aside, the pack itself holds a lot, and has plenty of compartments. The only flaw I have found so far is that there is only one exterior mesh pocket. I would prefer 2, one on each side. But that is my only complaint, and does not amount to enough annoyance to detract from my 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Redbeard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son an school
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son an school. The back pack is bigger than I anticipated which is great since the kids don't use lockers. Plenty of room. I've always loved my JanSport when I was going to school and it was well made and lasted my entire high school years. I'm hoping this will last just as long for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lanela

customer_reviews.title: Great functional and strong backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in middle school and we have fit a binder, 4 text books, pencil pouch, and other knick knacks all at the same time with room to spare. She is very petite but the backpack when filled is still comfortable with nice big wide straps. The only drawback is there is no hook for a lunch bag but that was an easy fix. Great quality. The last backpack was from LLbean and lasted 3 years. I will update this post.
customer_reviews.author: STT

customer_reviews.title: It's worth paying just a little extra.
customer_reviews.text: Big & sturdy, the color is a nice bright red just like the photo. I switched to Jansport backpacks years ago because they LAST and I was tired of buying a new backpack every year for each of the kids. With Jansport, one backpack will last *many* years. My husband still has the purple one he got in highschool, still in quite useable condition, too. It's worth paying just a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya M. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my 8th grade granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 8th grade granddaughter. I can not believe how much her pack weight is with all her books (no lockers at school). This is the big student backpack and let me say it really holds alot. She fits all her school books, binders, supplies with no problem, she said the straps distribute the weight equally and it is heavy duty fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little too big for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for school because I wanted something a little bit bigger, but it turned out just a little too big for what I wanted. I am also picky about my backpacks because if it's uncomfortable it hurts my back and I get headaches. This wasn't a good fit for me, but I'm sure it works great with other people. I actually now use it for a 72 hour kit, and it's holding everything nicely that goes in an emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P

customer_reviews.title: Makes Carting School Work Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and fun and lively for our kindergarten boy. He loves it. His classmates admire it. Many pockets! Fits lunch box and folder; mittens and hat; snacks, holds a water bottle and even has a pocket that fit his Crocs now that is winter here in Michigan. I see this backpack lasting a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Heather J. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: This book bag is WONDERFUL! Ordered this for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This book bag is WONDERFUL! Ordered this for my daughter. It is very large and is perfect for occasions other than school. Honestly, it is large enough to pack clothing in when traveling. There are many pockets and I believe there's even a pocket for cell phones. I love the color of this particular bag and pray that it lasts for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Candy B

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible for a little boy, for YEARS :)
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was basically indestructible for my son who had been going thru like 1 each couple months, then had this one for Years! So thankful for jansport!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Elaine 🌼

customer_reviews.title: Love jansport backpacks.
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the big student jansport I bought 10 years ago. I know it'll get just as much use! Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Holds many heavy books for school. Two complaints- the flap over the zippers is rather wide, so it often gets caught in the zipper; also, no padding on the backside, so whatever is put in it will poke you in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! JanSport is awesome and the colors are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! JanSport is awesome and the colors are vibrant! My son's bag is so cool, I'm envious! He's going into first grade in the fall, but he will grow into it. Plus it's better than those silly cheaply made character backpacks that run the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I personally feel this was made with me in mind m, when it came to the print. I’ve never felt more seen by a product. I was concerned after some reviews about how the pattern of the matieral wouldn’t display the sloth on the shark. But that wasn’t the case for me. ITS THE BEST!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bag.. color is accurate
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son. His other Jansport lasted from 7grade to 10 grade... so we bought another Jansport.
customer_reviews.author: Beanldy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Zippers broke within one week and it is a very thin, cheap feeling bag. This is so not worth the price. Dont do it!!!
customer_reviews.author: E Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for reliable backpack
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my backpack the next day! This backpack is perfect for a college student with a heavy load. Huge binders, textbooks, laptop, lunch box, etc. can fit in it with no problem. I love how it has two large compartments to keep things seperate. The organizer in the front is great for someone who prefers not to carry a pencil bag around. I recommend this to anyone who is sick in tired of lugging around a backpack AND carrying things in their hands. This backpack will last a lifetime!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The color is perfect, it vivid and 4 months later looks brand ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for school. We have never bought a backpack online before but we have bought jansport before so knew it would be okay. The color is perfect, it vivid and 4 months later looks brand new. Not as many compartments as her last one but still plenty and the color is the most gorgeous purple we have seen!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great "big girl" backpack.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter will start middle school in the fall so she wanted a big girl backpack with lots of storage and pockets. This one was perfect for all the specs she was looking for, especially the cool design. I also like that it is sturdy and well made, so it'll last long.
customer_reviews.author: Joon K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size in very durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very specific about which backpack she wanted. After receiving it I can see why. Sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Adnerb

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits everything my high schooler needs to take around with him. He’s had no problems with the zippers for all the compartments. Seems to be durable and easily washable.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Neil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: It’s Jansport. This is an awesome bag! Love the color and durability. It has many compartments. Some of which my daughter doesn’t even use. But well worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: C T

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous backpack! This is well-made (reinforced in all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous backpack! This is well-made (reinforced in all the right places), with more pockets than you'll know what to do with. I'm really impressed with the quality of this bag, and my junior-high daughter loves the look. Score!
customer_reviews.author: Galvaston

product_meta.title: JanSport Big Student Backpack
product_meta.description:
Our Big Student style is a backpack with lots of pockets. These are particularly useful for high school or college students where carrying large books and many different items ranging from digital tools to snacks become the norm. Large backpacks for college are a must today, plain and simple. Some may think that big backpacks are just too large, but our style and prints will make you forget the size because we make oversized backpacks look cool.

 Featuring two large main compartments, a front utility pocket with organizer, a zippered front stash pocket, a pleated front stash pocket, and a water bottle side pocket. 

We’re the original. JanSport started making packs and outdoor gear back in 1967. We're about the journey, the discovery of fun, freedom, and adventure.

We design our products to be durable, functional, and versatile. Whether you’re headed to a concert, to class, or going off the grid—we’ve got your pack. It’s what we’ve been doing for over forty years.
